metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11446 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
The ReadPESImage function in coders\pes.c in ImageMagick 7.0.6-1 has aninfinite loop vulnerability that can cause CPU exhaustion via a crafted PESfile.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11446` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

imagemagick - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
imagemagick-6-common - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
imagemagick-6.q16 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
imagemagick-6.q16hdri - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
imagemagick-common - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
libimage-magick-perl - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
libimage-magick-q16-perl - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
libimage-magick-q16hdri-perl - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
libmagick++-6-headers - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
libmagick++-6.q16-7 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
libmagick++-6.q16hdri-7 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
libmagickcore-6-arch-config - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
libmagickcore-6-headers - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
libmagickcore-6.q16-3 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
libmagickcore-6.q16-3-extra - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-3 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-3-extra - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
libmagickwand-6-headers - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
libmagickwand-6.q16-3 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
libmagickwand-6.q16hdri-3 - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
perlmagick - 8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8:6.9.7.4+dfsg-16ubuntu2').
